meanings.definition: A light-sensitive protein found in the retina of certain animals.
meanings.sent1: The porphyropsin in the eye helps animals see in the dark.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study porphyropsin to understand how animals see at night.
meanings.sent3: The porphyropsin in the retina threw a party for the other proteins.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like porphyropsin in the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The porphyropsin glowed softly, revealing the hidden world of the night.

meanings.definition: The visual pigment responsible for night vision in some animals.
meanings.sent1: Night vision relies on porphyropsin to detect light in the dark.
meanings.sent2: Animals with porphyropsin can see better at night than during the day.
meanings.sent3: The porphyropsin pigment whispered secrets of the night to the owl.
meanings.sent4: In the darkness, his eyes shone with the power of porphyropsin.
meanings.sent5: The porphyropsin pigment painted the night scene with shades of gray.
